name: Upstairs Bathroom
longDes: You are standing in a bathroom. White and black tile shines around you, and a clawfoot tub stands against the wall opposite the door.
shortDes: You are in a bathroom on the second floor. Tiles adorn the walls and a clawfoot tub stands opposite. A door to the West returns to the second floor landing.

features.name: tile
features.preActionDes: You hear a loud crash coming from the Green Room. One of the tiles has fallen and shattered on the floor.
features.inActionDes: The tile has shattered onto the floor, but you notice a space hollowed out where it fell from.

features.name: hollow
features.preActionDes: You notice something barely sticking out of the hollow.
features.inActionDes: You reach into the hollow and feel something small and metallic. It's a key!
features.postActionDes: You have taken the key from the hollow.
